Posts.Content:
Just a note to say hi myself!   Thank you . Sweet Angela, for keeping folks up to date 
  I've done 3 weeks of whole head radiation and the doc says 3 more shouldn't hurt and could help, so I'll go through Wed.

Posts.Content:
One of my posts disappeared too. Joyce, you are a hoot. A patio home is usually a one floor condo in a retirement community. Most have a screened porch or patio and look out over a golf course or pool. Got it?

Posts.Title: Hello all !

Posts.Content:
Oh I am so sorry, but she fought so hard and so long. I am privileged to have met and hugged her in St. Louis and will never forget her strong character , love of life, and ....just spunk.
Becky
Posts.Title: Mary T's daughter called this morning, her battle is over.

Posts.Content: Haven't been around much in a while and decided I couldn't go to bed tonight without saying hi.  So sad to read about Carla.  Can't catch up on everyone right now.
Posts.Title: Hello all !

Posts.Content:
Just wanted to say hi and update a bit. I'm doing pretty darn well, I think. The methotrexate seems to be helping my vision a lot and DH and I are sure enjoying time together and with the kiddos. Didn't get my taxotere last week as my white count was too low, so they added  leukovorin and hope/ plan  it will be ok tomorrow to get both chemos. Angela is taking me and I'm looking forward to spending time with her 
  It may be a long day--lab, MD then 2 1/2 hr treatment. My appetite is good.  I'm getting out most everyday--going to church or Target or grocery or lunch. Not driving--I'm not that crazy. Lucky enough to have friends to take me places. Let's see ...enjoying doing homework with kids, beautiful sunny fall days and beautiful rainy thundery days too.  Back pain  is very manageable.  Trying to take a rest every afternoon. DH is working on long neglected projects around the house like cleaning out the storage room, but is happy to help if I need something.
Posts.Title: hello friends

Posts.Content:
Becky from KY
Diagnosed 9/99 invasive ductal, soon found out it has spread to my spine
Was able to have 4 years with just hormonal treatment
Currently doing adriamycin and perking along with hope and faith
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share

Posts.Content: Today we had my wonderful daughter's 6th birthday party .  We had about 7 of her little girlfriends and several of their Mom's are dear friends who hung around to help.  We had play time and a fun craft and ice cream cake and goodie bags for all.  Everyone got along great and had fun.  She loves all her new gifts and got great craft things we can do together.  My wonderful sister in law Mary is here and helps in so many ways.  She is always ready to listen AND do laundry , dishes and rub me down with lotion!
Posts.Title: Have to share with you the best day----

Posts.Content:
Thanks for your sweet notes 
The only thing that could have made the day better is if Angela could have been here. She was laid up with a cold, but her DH brought DD and DS to the party..
Today my DSIL in law is going home but we all got to go to church together I got to visit my Mom and spend some special time cuddling with her. God is good.
Becky
